item.title: example implementations for CreateNewCloudFormationStack
item.description: Case 1 - all parameters left as default Case 2 - provides directions to update or view one or more parameters Case 1 - all parameters left as default Go to the AWS CloudFormation console at https://console.aws.amazon.com/cloudformation and click Create Stack > With new resources Leave Prepare template setting as-is For Template source select Upload a template file Click Choose file and supply the CloudFormation template you downloaded: staticwebapp.yaml Click Next
